FuncDef: This command enables BRG processing on the specified RADIUS proxy server. Whenever an Access-Accept message is received with the attribute Alc-BRG-Id present, this will trigger the creation of a BRG. The BRG will use thebrg-profilespecified in the Access-Accept message or fall back to this BRG profile. When the specifiedradius-proxy-serverhas a cache enabled, no cache entries will be created for a transaction identified as BRG. A RADIUS proxy server can only be listed in one BRG profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ID of the VRF where the proxy server is located.
Specifies the name of the RADIUS proxy server.
